cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on September 21, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8852, End Veteran Hunger Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 149 (Thursday, September 15, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACOBS of California:
H.R. 8852.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 8 of Article I of the Constitution.
[Page H7882]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: End Veteran Hunger Act of 2022
